HOMESERIES/addshow-add-to-list/tooltip: Add series to your favourites list
HOMESERIES/addshow-protip/lbl: Pro Tip: Hit [return] to add the first search result to your favourites
HOMESERIES/addshow-return-to-fav-list/to: Click to return to your favourites list
HOMESERIES/addshow-start-typing/lbl: Start typing to search for shows to add to your favourites list
HOMESERIES/addshow-type-series-name/plac: Type a series name to add to your favourites
HOMESERIES/addtrending-help-click-to-hid: Click 'Hide trending shows' to go back to your favourites list
HOMESERIES/addtrending-help-click-to-sho: Click a show to add it to your favourites
TRAKTTV/sync/desc:
If you have a Trakt.TV account, you can have DuckieTV automatically fill itself by passing your credentials below.
 All your favourite shows and watched episodes will be fetched and added to your favourites list.

 If you enable Trakt.TV Sync all shows that you add and episodes that you mark watched in DuckieTV will automatically synced to your Trakt.TV account.
